line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013 10:16PM

Due to a train with mechanical problem at Whitehall-South Ferry, the following service changes are in effect:

There is no [1] train service between Whitehall-South Ferry and 14 Street in both directions.

The [2] and [3] trains are running local between Chambers St and 14 Street in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.

Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains skip 116, 110, 103, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

For service to these stations, take the [6] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 59 St or 125 St
and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[6] Pelham Bay Park-bound trains skip 23 St, 28 St and 33 St

Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 29

For service to these stations, take the [6] to Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to a downtown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq
and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013 11:11PM

Due to a signal problem at Rockaway Av, [A] trains are delayed in b/d.

Please expect delays on [A] and [C] train service.



Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av

Weekend, 12:30 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 20 - 22

Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[A] No trains between 168 St and 207 St

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 29

[A] Service operates between Lefferts Blvd/Howard Beach and 168 St,
making local stops at 155 St and 163 St.

[SB] Broadway Shuttle Buses make all stops between 168 St and 207 St.
[SB] Fort Washington Av Shuttle Buses make all stops between 168 St and 190 St.

• Transfer between buses and trains at 168 St.

Planned Work
[A] Manhattan-bound trains skip Shepherd Av, Van Siclen Av and Liberty Av

Late Nights, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22 • Apr 26 - 29 • May 3 - 6

For service to these stations, take the [A] to Broadway Junction and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Howard Beach-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Euclid Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [A].




Sandy Reroute  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:14PM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[M] No trains running

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

The last Myrtle Av-bound train departs Metropolitan Av at 11:43 PM Friday.
The last Metropolitan Av-bound train departs Myrtle Av at 11:43 PM Friday.

[SB] buses run between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av, making all station stops.

• Transfer between [SB] buses and [L] trains at Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs.
• Transfer between [SB] buses and [J] trains at Myrtle Av.

Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av

Weekend, 12:30 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 20 - 22

Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Carroll St to Church Av
[G] Church Av-bound trains run express from Carroll St to Church Av

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

No Coney Island/Church Av-bound service at 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park and Fort Hamilton Pkwy.

For service to these stations, take the [F] or [G] to 7 Av or Church Av and transfer to a
Queens-bound [F] or [G].

For service from these stations, take the [F] or [G] to 7 Av or Carroll St and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F] or Church Av-bound [G].

Alternate travel note:
For service to 4 Av-9 St, transfer to the [R] at Jay St-MetroTech.

Note: Click here for Smith-9 Sts Station information.




Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains run via the [A] from Jay St-MetroTech to W 4 St

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

For service to York St, East Broadway, Delancey St, 2 Av, and B'way-Lafayette St,
take the [F] to W 4 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

For service from York St, East Broadway, Delancey St and 2 Av, take the [F] to
Jay St-MetroTech and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from B'way-Lafayette St, take the [D] to W 4 St and transfer to the [F].

Alternate travel note:
For York St, use the nearby High St [A] [C] Station instead.

line.name: G
line.text:
Planned Work
[G] Trains run every 20 minutes between Bedford-Nostrand Avs and Court Sq

Weekend, 5 AM to 11:59 PM, Sat and Sun, Apr 20 - 21

The last stop for alternate trains headed toward Court Sq is Bedford-Nostrand Avs.

• Transfer at Bedford-Nostrand Avs to continue your trip.




Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Carroll St to Church Av
[G] Church Av-bound trains run express from Carroll St to Church Av

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

No Coney Island/Church Av-bound service at 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park and Fort Hamilton Pkwy.

For service to these stations, take the [F] or [G] to 7 Av or Church Av and transfer to a
Queens-bound [F] or [G].

For service from these stations, take the [F] or [G] to 7 Av or Carroll St and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F] or Church Av-bound [G].

Alternate travel note:
For service to 4 Av-9 St, transfer to the [R] at Jay St-MetroTech.

Note: Click here for Smith-9 Sts Station information.

line.name: JZ
line.text:
Planned Work
[J] No trains between Crescent St and Jamaica Center

[E] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 5:30 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Apr 20 - 21

[J] Service operates between Chambers St and Crescent St.
[SB] Shuttle buses make all [J] stops between Crescent St and 121 St
and connect with the [E] at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

Travel Alternatives

For service between Crescent St and 121 St, take a shuttle bus.
• Transfer between [J] trains and [SB] buses at Crescent St.

For Sutphin Blvd/Archer Av and Jamaica Center, take the [E] instead.
• Transfer between [SB] buses and [E] trains at Jamaica-Van Wyck.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[Q] 57 St/7 Av-bound trains run express from Kings Hwy to Prospect Park

Weekend, 10:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

Trains stop at Newkirk Plaza and Church Av.

For service to Avenue M, Avenue J, Avenue H, Cortelyou, Beverley Rds and Parkside Av, take
the [Q] to Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza or Kings Hwy
and transfer to a 57 St/7 Av-bound [Q].

Shuttle buses make all stops between Franklin Av and Prospect Park.

line.name: SIR
line.text:
Planned Work
[SIR] Trains may not connect with the Staten Island Ferry

Weekend, 9 PM Fri to 4 AM Mon, Apr 19 - 22

Due to planned system maintenance, trains will depart St. George Terminal without delay.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Schedule | pdf

Click here for an additional travel note.

Note: At Eltingville, Annadale, Huguenot, Prince's Bay and Pleasant Plains Stations,
all trains depart from the St George-bound platform.

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013  3:34PM

B60 bus is detoured due to track work on Himrod St and Myrtle Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Wilson Av, right on Gates Av, left on Knickerbocker Av, left on DeKalb Av, right on Wilson Av and then regular route.

Eastbound: Via Wilson Av, right on DeKalb Av, left on Central Av, left on Green Av, right on Wilson Av and then regular route.

Buses will make all corresponding stops along the detour route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: B100 - B103
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:19PM

B103 bus service is detoured due to construction on Nostrand Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via Av H, right on Albany Av, left on Glenwood Rd, left on Flatbush Av and then regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour
Bx28 and Bx30 buses bypassing stop due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the Gun Hill Rd at Bronxwood Av bus stop.

Eastbound/Westbound: Customers are advised to use the
temporary bus stop on Gun Hill Rd at Colden Av.




Planned Detour
Bx12, Bx12 SBS and Bx22 bus stops are temporarily discontinued due to road construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Fordham Rd between Bronx
River Pkwy and Southern Blvd.

The Bx12 and Bx22 bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Belmont Av in both directions.

The Bx12 SBS bus stop at Southern Blvd is temporarily
discontinued. Buses will stop at Crotona Av in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12 and Bx12SBS route changes due to construction

All times

Due to long term construction, bus stops and terminals
have been relocated at Bay Plaza. Buses will operate
as follows:

New Bus Stops
Bx12/SBS Eastbound: On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op
City Blvd (across from Pier 1/Daffy's).
On Bay Plz Blvd, far side, Co-op City Blvd (across from
Applebee's/Raymour & Flanigan).

Bx12/SBS Westbound:
On Bay Plz Blvd, at Applebee's (First stop).

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx3, Bx11, Bx13, Bx35 and Bx36 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Buses will not make the W 181 St at Amsterdam Av stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to use W 181 St
at Audubon Av for bus service.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:19PM

Northbound M20 bus service is delayed due to a crane operation on 15 St and 8 Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:18PM

M14D bus service is detoured due to construction. Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via 10 St, right on Av A, left on 14 St and then regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along the detour route.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M66 buses detoured due to a Crane Operation

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 11:59 PM Sun, Apr 20 - 21

Buses are being detoured from 67 St between York and 1 Avs.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will make stops along 66 St
at corresponding locations.




Planned Detour
M50 buses detoured due to a Crane Operation

Weekend, 6 AM Sat to 9 PM Sun, Apr 20 - 21

Buses are being detoured from E 48 St between
1 and 2 Avs.

No stops will be missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M50 buses detoured due to a Crane Operation

Weekend, 10 PM Fri to 6 AM Sun, Apr 19 - 21

Buses are being detoured from E 49 St between
5 and 6 Avs.

Westbound: Customers are advised to use the
Madison Av at 49 St or 6 Av at 49 St bus stops.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M31 and M86 buses detoured due to a Crane Operation

Weekend, 6 AM Sat to 9 PM Sun, Apr 20 - 21

Buses are being detoured from 91 St between York
and 1 Avs.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along 1 Av
between 86 and 92 Sts at corresponding locatiions.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure due to the Tribeca Film Festival

All times until 11:59 PM Mon, Apr 29

Buses will not stop on Chambers St at West St.

Northbound: Customers are advised to board
on Harrison St at West St.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses will not make the stop on 7 Av South at
Waverly Pl between Charles and Perry Sts.

M20 Southbound: Buses will make stops on
7 Av South at 10 and 12 Sts.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at
Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops on Reade St
and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M11 buses are running with delays due to construction

All times

Southbound: Buses are running with delays due to construction
on Columbus Av between W 64 and W 63 Sts.

Note: Buses do not operate late nights.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M5, M7 and M104 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Due to construction, the bus stop on Broadway between
64 St and 63 St has been temporarily relocated.

Southbound: Customers are advised to board on
Broadway between 63 and 62 Sts.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:21PM

Q38 bus detoured due to road work on 80 St and Furmanville Av.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: Via Penelope Av, left on 80 St, right on Furmanville Av and regular route. 

Corresponding stops will be made on 80 St.

Allow additional travel time. 



Service Change  Posted: 04/20/2013  8:20PM

Q16 bus service detoured due to construction on Francis Lewis Blvd at 29 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 29 Av, right on Francis Lewis Blvd, right on Utopia Pkwy, left on 32 Av, left on Francis Lewis Blvd and regular route.

Allow additional travel time. 



Planned Detour
Q25, Q25Ltd, Q34, Q65 and Q65Ltd bus stop change

All times

Bus stop change implemented to help alleviate traffic
congestion on the southbound side of Sutphin Blvd as
well as the intersection of Sutphin Blvd at Archer Av.

Southbound: Buses will use the Sutphin Blvd between
Archer Av and 94 St location as a drop-off only bus stop.

line.name: S40 - S98
line.text:
Planned Detour
S74 buses running with delays due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are running with delays due to construction on
Van Duzer St at Bay St.

No stops missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Queens Midtown
line.text: One tube closed from 2 a.m. Sat., April 20 through 5 a.m. Mon., April 22 for continued repairs relating to Sandy. One lane in each direction in the remaining tube. Trucks must use alternate route.

line.name: Hempstead
line.text:
Hempstead Branch Customers:

Buses are replacing eastbound trains at Queens Village & Hollis this weekend to accommodate trackwork. Westbound service is not affected. For details, please pick up a copy of the special Hempstead Branch timetable or see http://bit.ly/10l2hIR.

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
West Hempstead Branch: No Weekend Service

There is no weekend/holiday service on the West Hempstead Branch. As an alternative, customers are advised to use the Hempstead, Lynbrook, Valley Stream or Merillon Avenue stations (all located in Fare Zone 4).

line.name: Wassaic
line.text: Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule. Customers seeking intermediate travel between Wassaic and Southeast must request the stop to the bus driver.  *Note:  Buses will only stop at intermediate stations when requested*
